Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Inene iNkosi yakho ngaloo Mini Iya kuba Isazi konke ngabo
Kananjalo yintoni na enokukuchazela okokuba iyintoni na iYure yesiThonga
YiMini apho abantu baya kuthi saa njengamabhabhathane
Lowo	uzenzo	zakhe	ziya	kufunyaniswa	zinobunzima esikalini
Ke lowo uzenzo zakhe ziya kufunyaniswa zilula esikalini
Yintoni na enokukuchazela okokuba iyintoni na inzonzobila
Yeha! Ukuba benisazi ngolwazi oluqinisekileyo (iziphumo zokuzilibazisa ngokuqokelela ubutyebi beniya kurhoxa kuloo nto, nizixakekise ngokukhonza uAllâh)
Kananjalo	ngaloo	Mini	niza	kubuzwa	ngobumnandi (enabuxhamlayo)
